subtitle: Thinking Allowed
Conversations on the leading edge of knowledge and discovery with psychologist Jeffrey Mishlove
Hello, I’m Jeffrey Mishlove. You know 2 months ago
I issued an “In Presence” monologue – like this one – in which I, for the very first time, after 5 years
of producing and hosting New Thinking Allowed, began to call for
volunteers. We received responses from 190 of you. Naturally,
it’s taken some time to get all of this organised but I think we’re making
real progress. You know, some of the volunteers have shared with me other
YouTube sites where they offer premium content to their viewers for a price, and up until now I have
resisted that model. I hope I can keep
resisting it. I’d like to make it available for free
but I am asking for more volunteers and I’ll explain why.
We have had a number of Zoom conferences now with our volunteers. We are in particular
looking for editors – people who will edit the transcripts
and translators – people who will translate these
transcripts into a variety of foreign languages. What we’re planning to do with them is very
exciting. It’s to create a searchable database of
all the transcripts of all of the New Thinking Allowed interviews – and there are about a thousand videos now on the channel
and more coming up every week.
So, you’ll be able to enter a particular
concept if you’re interested in it and the
searchable database will actually, when its full functional, and it shouldn’t take too long to get it fully functional,
it’ll call up the video at the moment when that concept is being discussed.
In fact, it’ll call up a series of videos like that.
We are also planning a newsletter, just for the volunteers, at this point.
The volunteers will also have access to preview videos before their
regular public release date.
I‘d like to also mention that some volunteers are just offering their talents and their services to
others who are volunteering. For
example, an Israeli filmmaker, Vladimir
Antonevicz – Vladi Antonevicz – did an
incredible documentary in which he went to Russia and
infiltrated right-wing gangs inside Russia. Violent gangs. And
prepared this documentary called Credit for Murder, in which he points out how the Putin regime is
actually using these violent groups.
It was just an amazing documentary. He
gave all our volunteers free access to that. We have another volunteer from
Melbourne, Australia,
who is an artist. A visionary artist who has offered to create visionary paintings of the New Thinking Allowed guests with
dreamscape backgrounds based on the content of the interviews. Zed Hughes, a
very talented artist. So, that’s in the works. Other things are in the planning stages right now
and others are more active. We are starting a Discord System – it’s a bulletin board where viewers can
talk to each other, get to know each other, interact with each other, and has voice chats
on it, as well. On April 15th
we will be releasing the video with Norman Shealy – the founder of the American Holistic Medical Association -
talking about holistic health tips for dealing with the Covid virus. I’m going to link to that video right now
so those of you are watching this, if you want to watch that video,
you will be able to access it - except for a few hours
prior to its public release at midnight,
early in the morning on April 15th.
We have actually an edited English transcript of that interview.
We’ve already translated it into Russian, and we’re currently working on French, Italian,
Spanish, Arabic translations, as well as Chinese, and Malay and I believe Japanese. A
very important aspect of the work with volunteers is distributing the
announcements about our videos widely on social media. This has been ongoing now for 2 months.
It’s been good but I know we can do much better.
We’re looking for more volunteers. I’m really looking for people who are willing to be
evangelists, who are willing to make a commitment to get these announcements
posted on discussion groups where they are relevant.
Obviously, there’s only so much that I can do myself and I’ve been doing this every, for every video for the last
5 years. But, I really want some help in that effort. People who are willing to join various
relevant discussions and to make sure that those groups on Facebook, on LinkedIn and elsewhere –
across Twitter. We’ve now opened an Instagram page.
All of these places will be
notified when we put out our new videos which are still going out 3 times a week, not counting
monologues like this one.
So, if you’re interested in volunteering your services,
once again, I would like to ask you to send me an email.
I’ll try to respond to you personally,
and if not me, other people who are part of our organising committee will do that.
We’ll find a way to get you connected to this network. It’s an opportunity for people
who have been following The New Thinking Allowed channel to connect with each other,
to share your talents, to share your visions so that we can work together in the goal of
mindfulness, of higher consciousness, of
transforming our human culture on Planet Earth. So, I urge you to
send an email to: friends@newthinkingallowed.com
I’ll conclude with a quote from Margaret Mead,
the great anthropologist, who said, “Never think that a small group of people can’t change
the world, because it has never happened any other way.”
Thank you for being with me.
